name: Dark Desire Mute 3
description:
Dark Desire Mute 3


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

"Jeff was ushered to the side as the girls began a whirlwind of activity on me. My makeup was changed. My hair was styled in such a way to allow a few strands to drift down towards my jawline, but the rest was kept securely out of the way." - Cindy, extract from episode 02

“Oh, I’m sure we can work something out,” Stephanie pats his arm. “I’m all about making customers happy, no matter their taste.” - Stephanie in episode 01

Episode 01 - Stephanie’s Proposition
--- includes separate paths and second outfits
